import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ItineraryDetail=()=>{const{slug}=useParams();const[itinerary,setItinerary]=useState(null);const[reels,setReels]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/itineraries/".concat(slug,"/")).then(response=>{setItinerary(response.data);fetchReels(response.data.id);}).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching itinerary:",error));},[slug]);const fetchReels=itineraryId=>{axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/reels/?itinerary=".concat(itineraryId)).then(response=>setReels(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching reels:",error));};if(!itinerary)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading itinerary details..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:itinerary.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Destination:"})," ",itinerary.destination]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Duration:"})," ",itinerary.duration_days," days"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Price:"})," \u20B9 ",itinerary.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:itinerary.description}),itinerary.qr_code&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://127.0.0.1:8000".concat(itinerary.qr_code),alt:"QR Code",style:{marginTop:"10px",width:"150px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{style:{margin:"30px 0"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Reels for this Itinerary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReelUpload,{itineraryId:itinerary.id})," ",reels.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No reels uploaded for this itinerary yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:"flex",flexWrap:"wrap",gap:"15px"},children:reels.map(reel=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{width:"300",height:"500",controls:true,src:"http://127.0.0.1:8000".concat(reel.video)},reel.id))})]});};export default ItineraryDetail;
